StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You want to know something?


I came here specifically because I heard
the <clr:0000>Thyphlo Ruins <clr:ffff>investigation needed a
helping hand.
But when I go inside, what happens?
I'm attacked by automatons!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I couldn't even begin to guess at the
origin or purpose of those things.

It's just sad, because I was so ready to
study an amazing Zonai ruin, and now I
have to turn around and leave.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Although... There is another ruin nearby. Maybe I'll
check that out and try coming back later.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>With such a high concentration of <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
one almost has to wonder if there's a
<clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>inside... <sp:5:0:0>Hm?
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Ah! Look at us, meeting again here!<sp:0:4:0>After waiting at Snowfield Stable, the
blizzard stopped, so I was finally able
to continue my ruins investigation.
This area has not only ruins but a chasm
too! It's the sort of place that's really
exciting for our survey team!
GoalPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I take it you're interested in the ruins?<sp:5:1:0>
That's rare for someone who's not in the
Zonai Survey Team.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>But never fear! In the name of public
edification and whatnot, why don't I tell
you what's written on the monolith?
It says <clr:0000>the dragon ring slumbers in the
depths of the<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>the...<sp:5:1:0>

...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Shoot.<sp:5:1:0> How did the rest of it go?<sp:5:0:0> I remember there
was a "shall" in there...

<sp:3:0:2:0000><sp:0:2:2:6400>Sorry. I guess I forgot.


There is a full translation in the <clr:0000>research
log <clr:ffff>over there, if you want to read that!<sp:0:2:2:5000>

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Meanwhile, I'd better start traveling <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>
to the <clr:0000>Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>... With all the <clr:0000>gloom <clr:ffff>here,
I can't risk going inside...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
GoRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There's a <clr:0000>geoglyph north of the snowfield<clr:ffff>!


I'm going to be the first to investigate it.
I just have to watch out for the <clr:0000>giant
monster <clr:ffff>with <clr:0000>three heads<clr:ffff>.
But this means I've got an opening! I can
go solve the mystery of the geoglyphs
before anyone else!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> How will I beat the monster?<sp:5:1:0>
Don't worry about it!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I'll figure it out when I get there.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>Is that terrible threat over?<sp:5:1:0> I'm saved?<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you so much!
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>You can see that I just can't cope with
monsters like that.<sp:5:0:0> But you've saved me.<sp:5:0:0>
Thank you!
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>I really wanted to investigate the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>
on the <clr:0000>other side of this peak<clr:ffff>.

But there's too much <clr:0000>gloom <clr:ffff>coming out.
I can't risk it.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Even the tiniest speck of <clr:0000>gloom <clr:ffff>on your
skin can make you sick.

I don't normally quit on things, but I don't
see what else I can do.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're not trying to go into the ruins,
are you?

I really wouldn't recommend it. There's so
much <clr:0000>gloom <clr:ffff>inside! It's toxic. And that
means there's likely a <clr:0000>chasm <clr:ffff>in there.
So just...turn around and go home, OK?
If you're curious about our findings, you
can read the <clr:0000>research log <clr:ffff>over there.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was just about to leave myself. I think
I'll try to investigate the <clr:0000>Thyphlo Ruins <clr:ffff>in
the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>...
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Happy>You look strong enough!<sp:5:0:0> Please! Take
care of this!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Don't you think that a lot of the
<clr:0000>sky ruins<clr:ffff> you can see from this area
have weird shapes?
Who built them? When? And for what
purpose? <sp:5:1:0>I'm going to go up there and
solve all these mysteries!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> How will I get up there? <sp:5:1:0>I'm sure I'll
find a way.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Let me dream for a second! Yeesh!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>All right!<sp:5:0:0> Maybe I've got a chance...<sp:5:0:0> Hey!
Help, please! I'm being attacked!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I came all the way to the <clr:0000>Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>,
and then...<sp:5:1:0>and then...<sp:5:1:0>what on earth were
those terrifying machines?
Whatever they were, they really did not
want me around.

It's just sad, because I was so ready to
study an amazing Zonai ruin, and now I
have to turn around and leave.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Although... There is another ruin nearby. Maybe I'll
check that out and try coming back later.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>Wait a minute!<sp:5:0:0> Look!<sp:5:0:0> What is that?!<sp:5:0:0>
That thing looks like the worst!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Unconscious_01>Ugh... Those monsters...<sp:5:0:0> They won't
discourage me from investigating
Zonai ruins though.
RainRun_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>There's no way I can investigate in
weather like this.<sp:5:1:0> I have to get
somewhere dry.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Monsters as frightening as that...<sp:5:1:0> I don't
know how you stand up to them! But
thank you!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>That was a really tough situation...<sp:5:1:0>
but I refuse to let that stop me from
investigating ruins!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Now then, I'll give you something.
Here,<sp:5:0:0> take it!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>I got into an awful situation there...<sp:5:0:0>but
you saved me. Thank you!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>The danger has passed?!<sp:5:0:0> Wow,
thank you!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The sky ruins appear to be from the age
of legends.

Which means there are likely relics from
that era...somewhere up there! I just have
to find them!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> How will I get up there? Really a
details guy, aren't you?

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Let me dream for a second! Yeesh!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Ease>Ah, that was a real shock there...<sp:5:0:0>
Thanks for saving me!
Near_GoRange_01: I want to go to the chasm.
RainRun:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Finally, someone I can talk to.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_00>But before we do that, let's relocate to
somewhere dry, shall we?
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>Can I complain to you about something?


I wanted to investigate the <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> on the
<clr:0000>other side of this peak<clr:ffff>.

But there's so much <clr:0000>gloom <clr:ffff>coming out,
I can't go near it!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Even the tiniest speck of <clr:0000>gloom <clr:ffff>on your
skin can make you sick.

So I guess I have to just...give up.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Want to hear something interesting?


The sky ruins are said to contain
relics from...<sp:5:1:0>the age of legends.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Haha! <sp:5:0:0>Can you imagine how much we'd
learn from just one of those relics?

If I find one, then KA-BOING! I'll shoot
straight up to the rank of assistant leader!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Huh? <sp:5:1:0>How will I get up there?


Don't you worry about that. <sp:5:0:0>I'll work out
the details as I go.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey! It looks like we're both stuck here
while we wait out the rain.

So we might as well talk, right? Do you
like ruins?

<sp:3:0:2:0001>I think it's so interesting that there are
two different kinds of ruins.

Some of them—<sp:5:0:0>the ones that were here
since before the Upheaval—<sp:5:0:0>appear to be
more recent.
Not to say they're not old. They are!


<snd:TalkPositive_01>But from what we can tell, they're not
quite as ancient as the ruins that fell from
the sky.
On close inspection, you'll see the two
kinds have <clr:0000>distinct designs and materials<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Anyway, that's enough out of me. Can you
tell I work for the Zonai Survey Team?
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Guess what! You know all those <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff>
that appeared after the Upheaval?

There's one right near us, just <clr:0000>north of
the snowfield<clr:ffff>!

No one's investigated it yet, since there's
a <clr:0000>giant monster<clr:ffff> with <clr:0000>three heads<clr:ffff> prowling
around it.
<snd:LaughS>Which means I've got an opening! I can
go solve the mystery of the geoglyph
before anyone else!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> How will I get past the monster?


<snd:Think_00>Eh... Don't worry about that. <sp:5:1:0>I'll work out
the details as I go.
RainPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Investigating ruins can't proceed in
conditions like this.

When it's time to rest...<sp:5:0:0>rest.<sp:5:1:0> When it's
time to work...<sp:5:0:0>work.<sp:5:1:0> That's the only way
the Zonai Survey Team can be its best.
BackRange_03_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was SO excited to investigate the ruins
and sky islands in this area...

Then I find out I can't get near <clr:0000>North
Lomei Labyrinth <clr:ffff>because of the <clr:0000>gloom<clr:ffff>.

And I can't get near the <clr:0000>Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>
in the southeast because of the weird
automatons.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01>So there's not much I can do, other than
stand around and complain.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> But at least I've got you here to
listen to my troubles.
RainPoint_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>All those Zonai ruins that were here
before the Upheaval...

Ancient as they are, it seems the ruins
that fell from the sky are even older!

You can tell because the design and
materials of the two types of ruins are
distinctly different.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>What do you think about that? Did you
learn something?
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm about to go investigate the <clr:0000>Thyphlo
Ruins<clr:ffff>, which are <clr:0000>east <clr:ffff>on this road.

With the new <clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>installed
there, it's clear that ruin will become
a big project for the survey team...
So if I do well on it,<sp:5:0:0> I could get promoted
to assistant leader!

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:LaughS>Assistant leader Juga...<sp:5:1:0> I'm feeling more important
just thinking about it!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Listen! There are big Zonai ruins called
the <clr:0000>Thyphlo Ruins <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.

Have you ever been?


<snd:TalkPositive_01>The site is huge, and its investigation
is badly understaffed, so I'm going to go
and help out.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_00>With the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff> that was installed
there, it's clear that ruin will become a
major project for the survey team...
Which means if I do well there, I could get
promoted to assistant leader!

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:LaughS>Assistant leader Juga...<sp:5:1:0> Ooh, I like the sound
of that...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Listen! Don't you think that a lot of the
<clr:0000>sky ruins<clr:ffff> you can see from this area have
weird shapes?
Who built them? When? And for what
purpose?<sp:5:1:0> I'm going to go up there and
find out!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>How? Eh... Don't worry about it. I'll work
out the details as I go.
BackRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Listen... I'm supposed to be investigating
ruins and sky islands around here.

But I can't go near <clr:0000>North Lomei Labyrinth<clr:ffff>
because of all <clr:0000>the gloom<clr:ffff>...

And I can't get near the <clr:0000>Thyphlo Ruins<clr:ffff>
because of weird automatons, so...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease_00>I really can't investigate...anything.
It's demoralizing.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Talking about it does make me feel a little
better though.<sp:5:1:0> Thanks for listening.
